name: Simple 1500 Series Vol.101: The Sentou
overview: In Simple 1500 series vol. 101 the Sentou the player takes the role of a young boy in charge of a bathhouse. Every week the player choose what duties will the boy do (cleaning the baths, rest, repair the ceiling, put more fire to the kettle, etc.) Depending on the jobs, the boy starts will increase or decrease. And every week depending on what the player chose an overseas reporter will come and make a report of the bathhouse, the same for the regular customers. In the game, the player's character can even fall in love with some of the girls, depending on his stats. The game features different endings depending on the character starts and the bathhouse status. The customers and the audience are different depending on the bathhouse, and there are different bathhouses and management tools to choose to play.
